verses.verse: Now the Philistines <WH6430> gathered together <WH6908> <WH853> all <WH3605> their armies <WH4264> to Aphek: <WH663> and the Israelites <WH3478> pitched <WH2583> by a fountain <WH5869> which <WH834> is in Jezreel. <WH3157>

And the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430> passed on <WH5674> by hundreds, <WH3967> and by thousands: <WH505> but David <WH1732> and his men <WH376> passed on <WH5674> in the rearward <WH314> with <WH5973> Achish. <WH397>

Then said <WH559> the princes <WH8269> of the Philistines, <WH6430> What <WH4100> do these <WH428> Hebrews <WH5680> here? And Achish <WH397> said <WH559> unto <WH413> the princes <WH8269> of the Philistines, <WH6430> Is not <WH3808> this <WH2088> David, <WH1732> the servant <WH5650> of Saul <WH7586> the king <WH4428> of Israel, <WH3478> which <WH834> hath been <WH1961> with <WH854> me these <WH2088> days, <WH3117> or <WH176> these <WH2088> years, <WH8141> and I have found <WH4672> no <WH3808> fault <WH3972> in him since <WH4480> <WH3117> he fell <WH5307> unto me unto <WH5704> this <WH2088> day? <WH3117>

And the princes <WH8269> of the Philistines <WH6430> were wroth <WH7107> with <WH5973> him; and the princes <WH8269> of the Philistines <WH6430> said <WH559> unto him, Make this fellow return, <WH7725> <WH853> <WH376> that he may go again <WH7725> to <WH413> his place <WH4725> which <WH834> <WH8033> thou hast appointed <WH6485> him, and let him not <WH3808> go down <WH3381> with <WH5973> us to battle, <WH4421> lest <WH3808> in the battle <WH4421> he be <WH1961> an adversary <WH7854> to us: for wherewith <WH4100> should he reconcile <WH7521> himself <WH2088> unto <WH413> his master? <WH113> should it not <WH3808> be with the heads <WH7218> of these <WH1992> men? <WH376>

Is not <WH3808> this <WH2088> David, <WH1732> of whom <WH834> they sang <WH6030> one to another in dances, <WH4246> saying, <WH559> Saul <WH7586> slew <WH5221> his thousands, <WH505> and David <WH1732> his ten thousands? <WH7233>

Then Achish <WH397> called <WH7121> <WH413> David, <WH1732> and said <WH559> unto <WH413> him, Surely, as the LORD <WH3068> liveth, <WH2416> thou <WH859> hast been upright, <WH3477> and thy going out <WH3318> and thy coming in <WH935> with <WH854> me in the host <WH4264> is good <WH2896> in my sight: <WH5869> for <WH3588> I have not <WH3808> found <WH4672> evil <WH7451> in thee since the day <WH4480> <WH3117> of thy coming <WH935> unto <WH413> me unto <WH5704> this <WH2088> day: <WH3117> nevertheless the lords <WH5869> <WH5633> favor <WH2896> thee <WH859> not. <WH3808>
Wherefore now <WH6258> return, <WH7725> and go <WH1980> in peace, <WH7965> that thou displease <WH6213> <WH7451> <WH5869> not <WH3808> the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines. <WH6430>

And David <WH1732> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Achish, <WH397> But <WH3588> what <WH4100> have I done? <WH6213> and what <WH4100> hast thou found <WH4672> in thy servant <WH5650> so long <WH4480> <WH3117> as <WH834> I have been <WH1961> with <WH6440> thee unto <WH5704> this <WH2088> day, <WH3117> that <WH3588> I may not <WH3808> go <WH1980> fight <WH3898> against the enemies <WH341> of my lord <WH113> the king? <WH4428>

And Achish <WH397> answered <WH6030> and said <WH559> to <WH413> David, <WH1732> I know <WH3045> that <WH3588> thou <WH859> art good <WH2896> in my sight, <WH5869> as an angel <WH4397> of God: <WH430> notwithstanding <WH389> the princes <WH8269> of the Philistines <WH6430> have said, <WH559> He shall not <WH3808> go up <WH5927> with <WH5973> us to the battle. <WH4421>

Wherefore now <WH6258> rise up early <WH7925> in the morning <WH1242> with thy master's <WH113> servants <WH5650> that <WH834> are come <WH935> with <WH854> thee: and as soon as ye be up early <WH7925> in the morning, <WH1242> and have light, <WH216> depart. <WH1980>

So David <WH1732> and his men <WH376> rose up early <WH7925> to depart <WH1980> in the morning, <WH1242> to return <WH7725> into <WH413> the land <WH776> of the Philistines. <WH6430> And the Philistines <WH6430> went up <WH5927> to Jezreel. <WH3157>
